title: Martinsville Speedway President Clay Campbell stops by WVVA
text: Martinsville Speedway President Clay Campbell stops by WVVA Bluefield, WVWVVA-TVMartinsville Speedway President Clay Campbell stops by WVVA to talk about the November 1st Sprint Cup Race. More >> Tazewell prepares for Richlands offense Tazewell, VAWVVA-TVJust up 460 to Tazewell where it is coming off its 2nd win of the season over Marion.. The bulldogs will face a much different test this week with one of the best offenses around. This team has struggled defensively for the most part this season, but has put together a couple good performances with both coming at home. The Blue Tornado offense is like nothing they've seen just yet, and its all about containing the points. "Its about picking you... More >> Bland Co and Giles remain undefeated with Monday night wins Bluefield, WVWVVA-TVBoth Bland Co and Giles Co improved to 5-0 with wins on Monday night. Bland Co defeated Montcalm 42-12, and Giles knocked off Galax 35-24. The Bears are off to the best start in school history. Giles has gone to 5-0 for the 4th year in a row. Up next, Bland will play at Narrows on Saturday. Giles will travel to Glenvar on Saturday. More >> Bluefield, WVWVVA-TVBoth Bland Co and Giles Co improved to 5-0 with wins on Monday night.
